org.freedom.util.resource
Class AbstractResourcePool

java.lang.Object
  org.freedom.util.resource.AbstractResourcePool
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DbConnectionPool
public abstract class AbstractResourcePool
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Pool de recursos genérico. Serve para o armazenamento qualquer tipo de objeto.
